name: mediaInputSource_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off a device connected to a specified TV input source.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn off.

parameters.name: mediaInputSource
parameters.description: The input source to turn off.
